com.facebook.ads

Class RewardedVideoAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.ads.RewardedVideoAd
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ad, FullScreenAd

    public class RewardedVideoAd
extends java.lang.Object
implements FullScreenAd
    RewardedVideoAd displays a rewarded video advertisement by Facebook

    To use the rewarded video, do the following: 

    
 RewardedVideoAd ad = new RewardedVideoAd(context, placementId);
 RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig loadAdConfig = ad.buildLoadAdConfig()
             .withBid(bidPayload)
             .withAdListener(adListener)
             .build();
 ad.loadAd(loadAdConfig);

    Since:
    4.23

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder
      Builder that allows to configure an ad loading.
      static interface  RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdShowConfigBuilder
      Builder that allows to configure an ad showing.
      static interface  RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig
      Marker interface for an object that represents an rewarded video ad load config.
      static interface  RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoShowAdConfig
      Marker interface for an object that represents an rewarded video ad show config.

      • setExtraHints

      • enableRVChain

        @Deprecated
public void enableRVChain(boolean enabled)
        Deprecated. since 5.7, this parameter will be ignored
        Whether we should enable RV ads to be shown in succession after the previous one finishes. This will typically be used by apps that offer a repetitive reward that users can collect multiple times. Eg. Get n lives for a game. This should be called before loading the ad.

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd()
        Description copied from interface: Ad
        Loads an ad.

        This method always returns immediately. The ad is loaded asynchronously. The control's ad listener will be called when loading finishes or fails.

        Specified by:
        loadAd in interface Ad

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig rewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
        Loads an ad.

        This method always returns immediately. The ad is loaded asynchronously. The control's ad listener will be called when loading finishes or fails. 

        
 RewardedVideoAd ad = new RewardedVideoAd(context, placementId);
 RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig loadAdConfig = ad.buildLoadAdConfig()
             .withBid(bidPayload)
             .withAdListener(adListener)
             .build();
 ad.loadAd(loadAdConfig);
        Since:
        5.6

public void loadAd(boolean failOnCacheFailure)
        Deprecated. since 5.6, use loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)

        @Deprecated
public void loadAdFromBid(java.lang.String bidPayload)
        Deprecated. since 5.6, use loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig)
        Description copied from interface: Ad
        Loads an ad from the payload supplied with a bid.

        This method always returns immediately. The ad is loaded asynchronously. If available, the ad listener will be called when loading finishes or fails.

        Specified by:
        loadAdFromBid in interface Ad
        Parameters:
        bidPayload - The payload supplied with the bid

      • show

        public boolean show()
        Shows the rewarded video ad

        This method should only be called after loadAd() is called and the ad listener has been notified ad has loaded

        Specified by:
        show in interface FullScreenAd
        Returns:
        false if no ad is loaded, true otherwise

      • show

        public boolean show(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoShowAdConfig rewardedVideoShowAdConfig)
        Shows the rewarded video ad

        This method should only be called after loadAd() is called and the ad listener has been notified ad has loaded 

        
 RewardedVideoShowAdConfig showAdConfig = ad.buildShowAdConfig()
             .withAppOrientation(appOrientation)
             .build();
 ad.show(showAdConfig);
        Parameters:
        rewardedVideoShowAdConfig - rewarded video ad config.
        Returns:
        false if no ad is loaded, true otherwise
        Since:
        5.6

      • buildLoadAdConfig

        public RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder buildLoadAdConfig()
        Returns RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder that allows to specify ad loading parameters. You should call loadAd(RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig) after all parameters have been set.
        Specified by:
        buildLoadAdConfig in interface FullScreenAd
        Returns:
        builder that allows to configure ad loading
        Since:
